title: Evelyn Trimborn - How to Use Technology to Grow Your Online Busi
description:
Publication Date: January 25, 2012

***Get Top Technology Tips to Grow Your Business, and Profits***

For many modern business owners, the accelerated rate of change and growth in relation to existing and new technologies can be bewildering. 

With so many new gadgets, software and websites such as social media sites, it can be confusing trying to decide what will be here today and gone tomorrow, and what new and emerging technologies are worth paying attention to.

Many of these technologies offer the promise of not only more revenue, but a way of doing things better, faster and cheaper. In order to gain a competitive advantage and use 'the next big thing' to enhance the success of your business, you need to be able to sort out what is relevant to your business, and what isn't. Then you need to take rapid action with any new technology that can help you stay ahead of the curve.

Time is of the essence when it comes to taking advantage of a great opportunity. This can be especially true given the current economic recession in the United States and in many parts of the world. 

In this timely guide, the authors, both top marketers and technologists who consult on all aspects of digital marketing and publishing, discuss the main technologies that your online business should be using now.

You will get a comprehensive strategy for keeping up to date on the latest technological breakthroughs. Learn how to decide whether or not a new technology will be worth integrating into your business and marketing plans.

Discover the most common mistakes that business owners make in relation to adopting technology in their business, and how to avoid them.

Learn more about some of the top technologies that you should be aware of and using in your business in order to make money on the Internet quickly and easily using your existing website. 

If you do not yet have a website, these tools will enable you to launch and grow a new site quickly, a site that will enable you to sell products and services online, process credit card payments, and offer value to your customers. 

Discover which technologies will also help you market your website effectively. Above all, learn more about the FREE technologies you can leverage once you have paid your inexpensive website domain registration and website hosting fees.

If you have been looking for the best ways to try to keep up with the latest technologies to gain competitive advantages in your industry, this guide will help you bring your business to a whole new level.

If you are just starting out in business, the technologies you will discover in this guide can help you create an impressive online business with the professional air you need to succeed, starting today.

Word Count=17,750
